package.description: An VS Code extension to automate hsp3root path configuration.
package.description.cfg.globs: [node-glob](https://www.npmjs.com/package/glob) pattern indicating the directory where HSP3 is installed.
package.description.cfg.override.enable: Enable the ability to overwrite extended settings with the current hsp3root.
package.description.cfg.override.applyCh: Overrides the settings of other extensions immediately after switching hsp3root.
After you have overridden the settings, reload the window. (executeCommand 'workbench.action.reloadWindow')
package.description.cfg.override.list: List of Setting IDs to be overridden by hsp3root.
package.description.cfg.override.listEx: Advanced configuration list to be overridden by hsp3root.
package.description.cfg.override.ignores: A list of configuration IDs to ignore overwrites.
package.description.cfg.task.env.enable: Overwrite the HSP3_ROOT variable in the terminal with hsp3root. (If changes are made while the terminal is running, they will not take effect until the terminal is restarted.)
package.description.cfg.override.scope: Sets the scope to be used when overriding the "toolset-hsp3.override.list" setting.
package.description.cfg.override.scope.W: Save the file in the directory ".vscode/settings.json" or in the workspace settings.
